lines.text:
[regarding the invitation's instructions to arrive precisely at midnight]
Midnight? Now why should she insist on midnight?
She probably saw "The Cat and the Canary".
The Hays Office ain't gonna like that long kiss!

[trying to prove Cassandra is mentally incompetent]
Will you please explain to the court just why you put vinegar on your apple pies?
That fat cook of mine makes them too sweet, she's done it for years, she wants to put weight on me.
[the whole court laughs, the cook especially]
If you're ever around, stop in for some apple pie
Thank you, maybe I'll do that... but I like vinegar on my apple pies.
Trowbridge Montrose, what were you doing snooping around outside my window at 1 o' clock in the morning?
I was walking through my garden, I always walk through my garden at 1 o' clock in the morning.
Have they found out who the killer is yet, Cassie?
If they haven't, then my bath water's getting cold for nothing.
Aunt Cassie couldn't be the killer, because she's not strong enough to lug around a couple of grown men like a set of Indian clubs.
